text: Hey team, looking to work with River Murphy for Bed Bath N' Table. Budget is approx $34,884 - need 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram reel, 2 x Instagram story, 1 x Twitter post. 11 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: October 2025. Need to confirm: usage rights
